_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five gifts of a good person [an5.148: They give a gift out of faith.
They give a gift at the right time.
They give a gift with no strings attached.
They give a gift without hurting themselves or others.
The results of giving each gift [an5.148: Having given a gift out of faith
Having given a gift at the right time
Having given a gift with no strings attached
Having given a gift without hurting themselves or others
